features.name: Static Homepage

features.name: Product Pages

features.name: Libraries
features.description: Up to date and well documented libraries for the most common programming languages make it easier to integrate buildeazy.

features.name: Prefixed Credentials
features.description: Prefixing API credentials to indicate their type and environment is an industry standard that reduces complexity and support requests.

features.name: Single Merchant ID
features.description: A single Merchant ID valid for all environments reduces complexity and support requests.

features.name: Unified Login
features.description: my.buildeazy.net is a single entry point for both prospective and registered users and merchants to simplify the process of registering and accessing a buildeazy account.

features.name: Dedicated Mobile Dialogs
features.description: Dedicated mobile dialogs and flows improve the user experience on mobile.

features.name: One Click Purchase
features.description: Logged in users can choose to skip the purchase dialog for PPU purchases to streamline the purchase process for experienced users.

features.name: Provisioning
features.description: Provisioning adds an item to another user's invoice free of charge to facilitate giving away content as a gift.

features.name: Read on: buildeazy.net/go
features.description: buildeazy.net/go redirects users to their last accessed item thus allowing "continuity" between different devices.

features.name: 0 € Single Sales
features.description: 0 € single sales are a quick fix for requiring users to log in.

features.name: Expiry Reminder Emails
features.description: Email reminders for expiring items can be used to renew them or send upselling offers.

features.name: Merchant Analytics
features.description: Analytics are crucial for merchants to increase their revenue.

features.name: Micro Subscriptions
features.description: By offering automatic renewal of expiring items (PPU only), buildeazy can create a new category of subscriptions.

features.name: Payment Link
features.description: A payment link, embedded in the user backend, iframes and emails allows users to pay a due invoice at any time.

features.name: Pay PPU Invoice with SIS Payment
features.description: By asking the user if he wants to pay his PPU purchases when paying for a SIS purchase, we can reduce the share of PPU invoices that are never paid.

features.name: Reselling of Expiring Items
features.description: Enabling merchants to offer users their currently active expiring item again allows merchants to create ongoing business relationships.

features.name: Seamless Renewal of Expiring Items
features.description: Queueing identical expiring items so that their total validity period is the sum of their individual validity periods removes the economic disadvantage from renewing before the item has actually expired.

features.name: Single Sale Consumables
features.description: Single sales should allow quantities to sell multiple instances.

features.name: Upselling
features.description: By defining upselling paths for expiring items, merchants can increase the revenue from their customer base.

features.name: Distributed Infrastructure
features.description: Globally distributed infrastructure minimizes response times and improves the user experience.

features.name: Legal Adjustments
features.description: Complying with U.S. legal requirements is a legal prerequisite for doing business in the U.S.

features.name: Tax Management USA
features.description: Being able to handle U.S. tax rules is a legal prerequisite for doing business in the U.S.

features.name: A/B Testing
features.description: A/B tests allow comparing variants of texts, layouts, flows, and interactions to continuously improve the product.

features.name: Business Analytics
features.description: Business-related information about internal processes and business development are crucial for controlling operations and improving performance.

features.name: Customer Service Backend
features.description: Providing information and functionality for managing users and merchants reduces cost of customer service and eliminates the risk of fatal errors when directly accessing the production database.

features.name: Frontend CSS Reengineering
features.description: A uniform, modular, and maintainable frontend architecture reduces complexity, increases consistency, and speeds up development.

features.name: Improved Tracking
features.description: Reliable tracking is a core competence of buildeazy.

features.name: WordPress Testsuite
features.description: Automated testing of the WordPress plugin ensures its quality and minimizes manual effort.

features.name: React-based Frontend
features.description: Technical decoupling of the dialogs frontend reduces technical complexity and speeds up development.
